Directed by Michael Engler. Salli Richardson-Whitfield. Deborah Kampmeier.

Written by Julian Fellowes. Julian Fellowes. Sonja Warfield.

Cast  Celia Keenan-Bolger( Mrs. Bruce 1) . Debra Monk( Armstrong 1) . Kelli O’Hara( Aurora Fane 1) . Taylor Richardson( Bridget 1) . Kristine Nielsen( Mrs. Bauer 1) . Patrick Page( Richard Clay 1) . Douglas Sills( Baudin (aka Borden) 1) . Michael Cerveris( Watson 1) . Kelley Curran( Turner 1) . Donna Murphy( Mrs. Astor 1) . Erin Wilhelmi( Adelheid Weber 1) . Rebecca Haden( Flora McNeil 1) . Sullivan Jones( T. Thomas Fortune 1) . Carrie Coon( Bertha Russell ) . Morgan Spector( George Russell ) . Louisa Jacobson( Marian Brook ) . DenÃ©e Benton( Peggy Scott ) . Taissa Farmiga( Gladys Russell ) . Harry Richardson( Larry Russell ) . Blake Ritson( Oscar Van Rhijn ) . Thomas Cocquerel( Tom Raikes ) . Simon Jones( Bannister ) . Jack Gilpin( Church ) . Audra McDonald( Dorothy Scott ) . Jeanne Tripplehorn( Sylvia Chamberlain ) . Claybourne Elder( John Adams ) . Amy Forsyth( Caroline ‘Carrie’ Astor ) . Katie Finneran( Anne Morris ) . Ward Horton( Charles Fane ) . Zuzanna Szadkowski( Mabel Ainsley ) . Nathan Lane( Ward McAllister ) . William Ryall( Mr. Hefty ) . Ashlie Atkinson( Mamie Fish ) . Linda Emond( Clara Barton ) . John Sanders( Stanford White ) . John Douglas Thompson( Arthur Scott ) . Craig Geraghty( Griffin ) . Brooke Bloom( Miss Grant ) . Michel Gill( Patrick Morris ) . Brian Keane( Brand ) . Katherine Romans( Cissie Bingham ) . Henry Stram( Lewis ) . Barbra Wengerd( Dressmaker ) . Sandra Caldwell( Ellen ) . James Clow( Chamberlain House Butler ) . Kylie Victoria Edwards( Angela Schermerhorn ) . Melanie Moore( Sally Drexel ) . Nick Ziobro( McNeil Footman ) . Joshua Burrage( Male Quadrille Dancer ) . Evan Kinnane( Male Quadrille Dancer ) . Raynor Rubel( Male Quadrille Dancer ) . Davis Wayne( Male Quadrille Dancer ) . Rebecca Radisic( Duke’s Dinner Guest ) . Marcella Lentz-Pope( Additional Voices ) . James Riordan( Dr. Lewis ) . Robert Loftus( Smartly Dressed Man #3 ) . Tom Blyth( Archie Baldwin ) . Nancy Kathryn Anderson( Sarah Taintor Gibbons ) . Michael Countryman( Carlton ) . Lisa Howard( Mrs. Henry Schermerhorn ) . Bill Irwin( Cornelius Eckhard ) . Michael Luwoye( George Parker ) . Kevin McCormick( Menacing Man ) . Desi Oakley( Miss Wavell ) . Ron Raines( John Thorburn ) . Blair Ross( Grand Woman ) . Stephen Spinella( Julius Cuyper ) . John Hans Tester( Charron ) . Brenda Wehle( Mrs. Armstrong ) . Ry Armstrong( Russell House Footman ) . David Harrell( Civil War Vet ) . Tim Eliot( Photographer ) . Christopher McLinden( Publishing House Secretary ) . Billy Beyrer( Termin/epal Porter ) . Robert Lee Harvey( Cab Driver ) . Ken Allen Neely( Fane House Footman ) . John Carrafa( Dancing Master ) . Clark Carmichael( Porter at Train Station ) . Florrie Bagel( Academy of Music Singer ) . Christopher Gurr( Man at The Times ) . Christopher Higgins( Russell House Footman ) . Christopher Harrod( Prosecutor ) . Peter Crouse( Male Spectator ) . Ryan Halsaver( Cab Driver ) . Micaela Diamond( Shop Assistant ) . Katherine Laheen( Bloomin/epgdales Assistant ) . John Hedges( Conductor ) . Anne-Marie Cusson( Mrs. Cuyper ) . Mat Hostetler( Thomas Edison ) . Carolyn Holding( Helen Astor ) . Conan McCarty( Judge ) . Liz McCartney( Female Spectator ) . Caleb Dicke( Russell Ball Footman ) . Stephanie Ittleson( Seamstress ) . Jonathan Spivey( Senior Manager ) . The Excelsior Cornet Band( Band ) . Ben Van Bergen( Fish House Butler ) . Paul Slade Smith( Union Club Waiter ) . Dared Wright( Kowalski ) . Jacob Keith Watson( John Dixon ) . Jake Eavey( Fighting Man ) . Frank Alfano( Fighting Man ) . Mick O’Rourke( Shoved Man ) . Chip Abbott( Waltz Dancer ) . Nika Antuanette( Waltz Dancer ) . Christina Belinsky( Waltz Dancer ) . Amanda Braun( Waltz Dancer ) . Nicholas Burrage( Waltz Dancer ) . Mia Deweese( Waltz Dancer ) . Leigh-Ann Esty( Waltz Dancer ) . Tenealle Farragher( Waltz Dancer ) . David Ferguson( Waltz Dancer ) . Kaitlyn Frank( Waltz Dancer ) . Lauren Gibbs( Waltz Dancer ) . Jill Gittleman( Waltz Dancer )

Language English.

Producers Gareth Neame. David Crockett. Holly S. Rymon. Erica Armstrong Dunbar. Michael Engler. Julian Fellowes. Ginger Marley. Salli Richardson-Whitfield. Claire Shanley. Sonja Warfield. Luke Harlan. Jacquelyn Carr. Bob Greenblatt.

Production Universal Television. Home Box Office (HBO). Factory Underground.

 

Number of Seasons 2

Number of Episodes 18

Status OnGoing (2022–)
